name: module-13-challenge-orm
description: This is an __<u>[E-commerce Application](https://github.com/TheR16H/BuySellBuySell)__.</u> the purpose of it is to be able to keep track of your products at your business. with this application you can  - seperate your items by tags / categories. - add a price to your items  - and even delist (delete) them if need be.
